knimeNode.name: MXML.GZ Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node imports an MXML.GZ event log from the disk.

fullDescription.intro: This node imports a MXML.GZ event log from the local file.The output is shown in a graphical view.
fullDescription.option:
The method to read an event log. There are two methods available:
OPEN NAIVE:
Open XES standard reading method. Only XES Standard extensions can be read from the XML file.
IEEE Lenient:
IEEE XES can read a lenient IEEE XES log from a plain XMLserialization.
The location of the event log
